name: Blue Blob Saves the Baby
description:
This game was created in 72 hours by a single developer for the 2020 Extra Credits Game Jam. Other than the original Edvard Grieg composition I recreated, playtesting, and having someone scream into a microphone, all programming, music, sound effects, and art were created during those 72 hours by one person. This is the first video game I have ever published, so be kind.

The theme this year was "Take Care", and it's clear to see by playing the game where that theme was utilized. The intro cinematic introduces a young blue blob who lives in a rain gutter with several other blobs who witness a baby accidentally fall out of a window. Our titular blue blob jumps into action and stands determined to return the baby to its mother by navigating a series of puzzles.

This game is top-down in isometric perspective and works on a grid-based movement platform. Return the baby to the marked location to proceed. Have fun!
